kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text 'marcelo@gmail.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text 'pwd123' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Split String
kw.msg: @{splited_name} = [ Marcelo | de | Oliveira ]
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${element} = css=header .right small
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=header .right small at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: Text: 'Olá, Marcelo'
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${element} = xpath=//strong[text()="Implementar planilhas financeiras"]/..//button[@class="task-remove"]
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
